description: Black Cat Claw, or Acacia redolens, is an amazing plant species particularly suited to many climates. It is fast-growing and produces beautiful, delicate yellow flowers during its blooming season. Its most unique feature is its long, narrow thorns, which give it its name. The Catâ€™s Claw thorns also serve a useful purpose, providing protection from injury and animals. The foliage provides a lush green canopy that is sure to please any gardener. This plant is an ideal choice for anyone wanting an attractive and hardy addition to their garden.
